Card.Header.description: Controls the spacing used when not the first child.

Card.Container.description: Alters how "high" the Card appears to be off the page.

Card.Container.description: Sets the size of children / spacing relative to the font size of the Card.

Card.Footer.description: Adjusts where the child items will be placed within the Card.Footer along both axis.
